doc.after: Having consolidated power in the northwest Chandragupta pushed east towards the Nanda Empire Afghanistan s significant ancient tangible and intangible Buddhist heritage is recorded through wide ranging archeological finds including religious and artistic remnants Buddhist doctrines are reported to have reached as far as Balkh even during the life of the Buddha 563 BCE to 483 BCE as recorded by Husang Tsang
